default.placeholderSearchBar: Give me all customers registered this month

alert.title: AI Copilot
alert.message: The export assistant allows you to export easily using prompt inputs.

base.title: This assistant can help you to export the data you need with ease.
base.subtitle: For e.g:

example.exampleOne: Give me all customers who registered the last month
example.exampleTwo: Give me all orders placed at the last Black Friday
example.exampleThree: Give me all promotion codes which have been used

base.helpText: This version of the assistant only supports customer, product, order, category, newsletter, promotion code, promotion discount, property, cross-selling, and product price
base.label: Prompt
base.placeholder: Give me all customers registered this month
base.messageExportDone: Assistant: A new export process has been added

modal.messageEmptyTitle: No entities found for this prompt
modal.messageLoading: Please wait while creating your prompt. It might take some time.
